casebody.data:
SETLIFF
v.
SUBWAY REAL ESTATE. No. 413PA06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 8, 2007. Norman Sloan, Clemmons, for Subway Real Estate.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th day of October 2006 by Plaintiff to Supplement and Amend the Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 8th day of March 2007."
